awd_titl_txt: Workshop on Enhancing the Role of Universities in Power     Electronics Education and Research, in Baltimore, Maryland  on July 6 and 7, 1989.
awd_abstract_narration: This workshop has been organized to bring together representatives              from universities, electric utilities, industry, the military and               government to address national needs in power electronics education             and research.  The objectives of the workshop will include:                     assessment of national manpower needs in power electronics through the          year 2000 and beyond; review of the present status of power                     electronics education and research in the U.S. and abroad; review of            university/industry/government relations in the U.S. and abroad with            respect to research support, patent issues, publication issues,                 technology transfer and commercialization, job opportunities in power           electronics; review university needs in establishing power electronic           programs; and review of the mechanisms by which utilities, industry,            government and the military can work with universities to meet                  national needs in power electronics education and research.
org_div_long_name: Division of Electrical, Communications and Cyber Systems
